title: Sweet Little Nothing
description: EMMYMy fall from grace was one for the books. All it took was his word against mine for everything to topple.Liar. Slut. Snitch.Now, I wear my shame like a scarlet letter pinned to my chest. People say I ruined his life. Except, he’s the one who irrevocably broke me—my heart, my body, my soul…my will to live.STERLINGLike a little coward, she thinks the span of five states is enough to keep her safe. But I know where she is and I’m going to make her pay. She ruined my best friend’s life. Now…I’m going to ruin her. One by one, I’ll spill her secrets, until she has nowhere left to turn—except to me, her very own big, bad wolf.
author: L.K. Farlow
